author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 47-year-old man, suspected to be involved in over 50 burglary cases in Chennai and neighbouring States, was arrested on Monday. V. Kamalakannan was caught during a routine vehicle check by the police. He had recently committed a burglary at a spare parts showroom in Ambattur.

Based on the CCTV footage recovered from the scene of crime, police were searching for him. On Monday night, Kamalakannan was riding a motorcycle when he was picked up and later arrested. Gold jewels weighing more than 15 sovereigns were recovered from him.

A case has been registered.
title: Burglar wanted in over 50 cases arrested
